original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cāpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena cāpassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, cāpo sutacchito namito yāvaggamūlaṁ samakameva anunamati nappaṭitthambhati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja cāpaḥ su tacchitaḥ namitaḥ yāva agga mūlam samakam eva anunamati na paṭitthambhati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabbaṁ nappaṭipharitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena thera nava majjhima samakesu anunamitabbam na paṭipharitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cāpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja cāpassa ekam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena vidhura (puṇṇaka) jātake—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena vidhura puṇṇaka jātake
